Copy or link here the outer python libraries that are necessary
to run a Flask application and to work with MongoDB, i.e.
Flask, Werkzeug, PyMongo, ...

The action may be (depending on the running system) something like:

> apt-get install python-dev mongodb-server
>
> pip install pymongo
> pip install Flask

Alternatively, just install the system packages, if they are available
for the running system:

> apt-get install python mongodb-server python-pymongo python-pymongo-ext python-werkzeug python-flask
